thread.title: BRIEF-Paypal Holdings Says Drew Down Additional $500 Mln Under 364-Day Delayed-Draw Term Loan Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Paypal Holdings Says Drew Down Additional $500 Mln Under 364-Day Delayed-Draw Term Loan Credit Facility

organizations.name: delayed-draw term loan credit facility reuters staff

text:
April 3, 2018 / 8:27 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Paypal Holdings Says Drew Down Additional $500 Mln Under 364-Day Delayed-Draw Term Loan Credit Facility Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - PayPal Holdings Inc: 
* PAYPAL HOLDINGS SAYS DREW DOWN ADDITIONAL $500 MLN UNDER 364-DAY DELAYED-DRAW TERM LOAN CREDIT FACILITY - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2q3UJdF ) Further company coverage:
